title: MISSION BROKEN
body: So i had first win of the day up and i played a game as garen and stompped pretty hard and then when i was done it was still there even though i won please help

replies.body: I wonder if you might have been playing a custom game when that mission didn't complete, or if it possibly happened around the time that the server issues were happening so it didn't register correctly? It looks like you were able to complete the mission finally, so there's also a chance it was just delayed. Be sure to let me know if this happens again so we can try to get to the bottom of it before it fixes itself.
